query: I love to read, but my eyesight is nearsighted because of it, do you have any suggestions?
safety warning: Incorrect sitting postures not only affect body posture when reading, but may also have adverse effects on vision health, and even lead to excessive eye fatigue and squinting. When people hunch their backs, lean on books or tilt their heads to read, the distance between their eyes and the book is often too close or the Angle is incorrect. This makes the eyeballs need to constantly adjust the focal length to see the text clearly, causing tension in the eye muscles. It is recommended that when sitting or standing, one should keep the back straight, the shoulders relaxed and the chest naturally raised
